original_text: Then from the sacrifice of the peace offering he shall offer as a food offering to the Lord its fat; he shall remove the whole fat tail, cut off close to the backbone, and the fat that covers the entrails and all the fat that is on the entrails
korean_text: 그는 그 화목제의 제물 중에서 여호와께 화제를 드릴지니 그 기름 곧 미골에서 벤 기름진 꼬리와 내장에 덮인 기름과 내장에 붙은 모든 기름과

sentences.original_text: Then from the sacrifice of the peace offering
he shall offer as a food offering to the Lord
he shall remove the whole fat tail
cut off close to the backbone
and the fat that covers the entrails
and all the fat that is on the entrails
sentences.korean_translation: 내장 위에 있는 모든 기름을 바칠 것이라
